fields.name: Precedentedness
fields.description: The extent to which the project is similar to previously developed projects

fields.name: Development Flexibility
fields.description: The extent to which the project can be developed with flexibility

fields.name: Architecture/Risk Resolution
fields.description: The extent to which the architecture and risk resolution is handled

fields.name: Team Cohesion
fields.description: The extent to which the team works together

fields.name: Process Maturity
fields.description: The extent to which the development process is mature

fields.name: Required Software Reliability
fields.description: The extent to which the software must perform its intended function over a period of time

fields.name: Database Size
fields.description: The size of the database that the software will use

fields.name: Product Complexity
fields.description: The complexity of the product being developed

fields.name: Required Reusability
fields.description: The extent to which the software must be reusable

fields.name: Documentation Match to Life-Cycle Needs
fields.description: The extent to which the documentation matches the life-cycle needs
